channel.title: Question about character rights!
channel.description:
Hey moparscape users. I have a server ( Silab Garza v6 ) and i made donator status. If i declare ::donator it makes some one character right level 4, this is right its what i was planning for. Now im having second thoughs because hidden admin is just way to much. how can i make it so i make character rights 5 be donator, and they have no commands lik ip ban and such. I just want char right 5 be plain like 0.
On a side note must i change what i put for ::donator because it gives them 4 what would i do jsut cahnge the number to 5?
please help ty for looking :):):)

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Try Donator == 1 and Make Donator.txt on config/Data xD

Georgio

Read full topic

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Yes, they will still be hidden admin but will have no commands as a normal administrator. They will just be like a normal player but p.rights 4.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @trueballar trueballar
item.description:
@trueballar wrote:

but i dont want them to be admin though[quote=“Slivion, post:4, topic:279078”]Ok, it’s going to take sometime.

In an administrator command it should say “playerRights >= 3) {” etc. Change every command to “playerRights == 3)”. This makes it so the command is only available to rights of 3.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Ok, it’s going to take sometime.

In an administrator command it should say “playerRights >= 3) {” etc. Change every command to “playerRights == 3)”. This makes it so the command is only available to rights of 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @trueballar trueballar
item.description:
@trueballar wrote:

yeah but if i make it 5 its still hidden admin all the way to 10 i think i wana know how to change 5 so there is no commands?[quote=“Slivion, post:2, topic:279078”]No, not really. You should go to where the command is added. It should declare something like “donator(playerName);” or “playerRights = 4;”. Just change the 4 to a 5.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Question about character rights!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

No, not really. You should go to where the command is added. It should declare something like “donator(playerName);” or “playerRights = 4;”. Just change the 4 to a 5.

Read full topic
